name: Marvel's Beef and Scallion Rolls (Negimaki)
author: Marvel's Kitchen
summary: Fantastic appetizer (or main) for beef eaters, these negimaki beef rolls are elegant and easy. Great with a shot of sake or cold beer. Prepare in advance and cook them up when your guests arrive. You'll make this more than once!
ingredients: ½ pound flank steak, very thinly sliced into 8 pieces
1 bunch scallions, halved lengthwise and crosswise
directions: Place 2 or 3 scallion pieces across a slice of beef and roll up tightly
Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat
Add beef rolls, seam-side down, and cook for 1 minute
Roll and cook to brown on all sides, about 5 minutes more
Add soy sauce, sugar, sake, and dashi to the skillet and cook, rolling beef to coat, 2 to 3 minutes
Transfer beef to a plate and increase heat to reduce liquid, 3 to 5 minutes
Add mirin and return beef rolls to the skillet, rolling until well coated and heated through
Slice rolls in half to serve
